T02D3180:195b-1: b'a g'i shva ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3180:195b-3: ngag gi dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs /
T02D3180:195b-4: de kho na nyid bzhin du stong pa nyid bsgoms
T02D3180:195b-5: pa'i rjes thogs la chu'i dkyil 'khor la padma dkar
T02D3180:195b-6: po 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte par /
T02D3180:195b-7: chos thams cad ni 'chi ba las kun nas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3180:195b-8: zhes lhags par mos par byas pas zla ba la
T02D3180:195b-9: gnas pa'i yi ge aam dkar po yongs su gyur
T02D3180:195b-10: pa las / dkar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa
T02D3180:195b-11: rdo rje skyil mo krung gi steng na phyag mnyam
T02D3180:195b-12: par gzhag pa'i phyag rgya mdzad cing /
T02D3180:196a-1: lus pa rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02D3180:196a-2: zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i rje btsun 'jam dpal
T02D3180:196a-3: gyi skur bdag nyid skad cig gis rdzogs par byas
T02D3180:196a-4: te / rang gi snying ga'i zla ba dang padma'i
T02D3180:196a-5: steng du yi ge kham las byung ba'i dung ngo
T02D3180:196a-6: te / // de'i dbus su aom badzra h'a ram zhes bya bas rdo rje lce'o //
T02D3180:196a-7: lce'i steng du padma dmar po'o /
T02D3180:196a-8: de'i steng du sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas rnam par bsams la /
T02D3180:196a-9: kha 'og tu bltas nas bdud rtsi 'bab pa'i yi
T02D3180:196a-10: ge bam dkar po rang nyid kyi rkan gyi phyogs
T02D3180:196a-12: aom b'a kye dam na ma: bya ba ni bzlas pa'i sngags so //
T02D3180:196a-13: 'di ni phan yon chen po dang ldan pa ste /
T02D3180:196a-14: chos kyi dung gi ting nge 'dzin thob par byed
T02D3180:196a-15: pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngag gi dbang phyug gi
